custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: LucipherDev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TangoFlux
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Custom Nodes for 'TangoFlux: Super Fast and Faithful Text to Audio Generation with Flow Matching'. This generates high-quality 44.1kHz audio up to 30 seconds using just a text prompt.

custom_nodes.author: welltop-cn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TeaCache
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial implementation of [ali-vilab/TeaCache](https://github.com/ali-vilab/TeaCache) for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: jammyfu
custom_nodes.title: Painting Coder Utils
custom_nodes.description: A practical collection of nodes for ComfyUI that streamlines image and text processing workflows. Features include image optimized resolution adjustment, text cleaning tools, dynamic image/text combination, and mask preview utilities. Perfect for artists and developers looking to enhance their AI art creation pipeline.

custom_nodes.author: calcuis
custom_nodes.title: gguf
custom_nodes.description: gguf node for comfyui

custom_nodes.author: bombax-xiaoice
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OpenSoraPlan
custom_nodes.description: Another comfy implementation for the short video generation project PKU-YuanGroup/Open-Sora-Plan, supporting latest 1.3.0 and 1.2.0 and image to video feature, etc.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HunyuanVideoSamplerSave
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node implementation for optimized video generation and motion effects, designed to work with Hunyuan text-to-video models.

custom_nodes.author: GraftingRayman
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PuLID-Flux-GR
custom_nodes.description: PuLID for Flux

custom_nodes.author: ainewsto
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-labs-google
custom_nodes.description: NODES: ComfyUI-ImageFx, ComfyUI-Whisk

custom_nodes.author: facok
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TeaCacheHunyuanVideo
custom_nodes.description: This is a TeaCache acceleration node for HunYuan Video, supporting the native node workflow for seamless upgrades. Simply choose the acceleration multiplier you want—currently, three levels are available.

custom_nodes.author: gremlation
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ViewData
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that displays the type and contents of whatever is connected to the input. In the case of a Tensor object, it shows the shape instead of its value.

custom_nodes.author: yichengup
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_Redux_Advanced
custom_nodes.description: Redux style adds more controls

custom_nodes.author: GraftingRayman
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI QueueTube
custom_nodes.description: These nodes allow your YouTube LiveStream viewers to create on your local ComfyUI, you can make this a members only feature with a screen behind you displaying your members creations

custom_nodes.author: mira-6
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-sasolver
custom_nodes.description: SASolver for Comfyui. Adapted from [a/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI#4454](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI/pull/4454) and [a/https://github.com/Koishi-Star/Euler-Smea-Dyn-Sampler](https://github.com/Koishi-Star/Euler-Smea-Dyn-Sampler)

custom_nodes.author: gremlation
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-JMESPath
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that runs a [a/JMESPath](https://jmespath.org/) query against input JSON and outputs the result.

custom_nodes.author: gremlation
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-jq
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that runs a [a/jq](https://jqlang.github.io/jq/) query against input JSON and outputs the result.

custom_nodes.author: gremlation
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageLabel
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that extends an image vertically to add a label either above or below it.

custom_nodes.author: gremlation
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TrackAndWheel
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension that improves panning and zooming on trackpads and with the mouse wheel.

custom_nodes.author: nmlen
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-mosaic-blur
custom_nodes.description: A simple mosaic blur node for ComfyUI that uses CV2 or Pillow

custom_nodes.author: jerrylongyan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-My-Mask
custom_nodes.description: Some nodes for processing masks, currently including nodes that fill in the concave parts of existing masks with convex hulls.

custom_nodes.author: sh570655308
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GigapixelAI
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes use gigapixelai in comfyui.

custom_nodes.author: sh570655308
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TopazVideoAI
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes use topazvideoai in comfyui.

custom_nodes.author: FinetunersAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Finetuners_Suite
custom_nodes.description: A suite of nodes for ComfyUI that helps making ComfyUI more accesible for artists

custom_nodes.author: ChenDarYen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TimestepShiftModel
custom_nodes.description:
This is a ComfyUI implementation of the timestep shift technique used in [a/NitroFusion: High-Fidelity Single-Step Diffusion through Dynamic Adversarial Training.](https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.02030)
For more details, visit the official [a/NitroFusion GitHub repository](https://github.com/ChenDarYen/NitroFusion).

custom_nodes.author: facok
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HunyuanVideoMultiLora
custom_nodes.description:
A custom LoRA-loading node designed to prevent issues such as blurriness and other artifacts when loading multiple LoRAs in HunYuan Video.
Usage Instructions: The connection method remains unchanged from the original. The only difference is the additional blocks_type option. Please select double_blocks.

custom_nodes.author: JJ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Jtils
custom_nodes.description: An extension for ComfyUI that adds utility functions and nodes not available in the default setup.

custom_nodes.author: billwuhao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_OneButtonPrompt_Flux
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI_OneButtonPrompt_Flux is a Flux prompt generation node. The subject can be 'human,' 'other' or a combination of both. For human, pose settings can be enabled. Additionally, various styles can be applied. Finally, combine it with 'Prompt Enhancement' to seamlessly automate image generation, eliminating the hassle of designing prompts.

custom_nodes.author: pandaer119
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_pandai
custom_nodes.description: Introduction The ComfyUI_pandai node is a custom ComfyUI node designed to interact with the DeepSeek API. It supports text generation, translation, and text polishing. With this node, users can easily generate text, translate content, and refine the generated text for better quality.

custom_nodes.author: umiyuki
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Pad To Eight
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that pads an image to a multiple of 8 width.

custom_nodes.author: Meettya
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OneForOne
custom_nodes.description: Node:Image Fit Calculator

custom_nodes.author: KunmyonChoi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_S3_direct
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI custom_node that load and save file directly from S3
Simplified version of [a/https://github.com/kealiu/ComfyUI-S3-Tools](https://github.com/kealiu/ComfyUI-S3-Tools)

custom_nodes.author: laogou666
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-LG_Relight
custom_nodes.description: A simple implementation of real-time 3D lighting in ComfyUI. It's an open-source node, have fun playing around!

custom_nodes.author: fssorc
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RopeWrapper
custom_nodes.description: Wrap Rope into ComfyUI, do a little change to use in ComfyUI. All credit goes to Hillobar and his ROPE [ㅁ/https://github.com/Hillobar/Rope](https://github.com/Hillobar/Rope)

custom_nodes.author: hodanajan
custom_nodes.title: optimal-crop-resolution
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node to calculate optimal resolution to crop the image to (from a list of aspect ratios)

custom_nodes.author: inventorado
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Neural Network Toolkit NNT
custom_nodes.description: Neural Network Toolkit (NNT) for ComfyUI is an extensive set of custom ComfyUI nodes for designing, training, and fine-tuning neural networks. This toolkit allows defining models, layers, training workflows, transformers, and tensor operations in a visual manner using nodes.

custom_nodes.author: Hullabalo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Loop
custom_nodes.description: A pair of nodes (Load Image and Save Image) to create a simple loop in your ComfyUI inpainting workflow, without the need of loading your last saved image

custom_nodes.author: leeguandong
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FluxCustomId
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI nodes to use FluxCustomId
Original repo: [a/https://github.com/damo-cv/FLUX-customID](https://github.com/damo-cv/FLUX-customID)

custom_nodes.author: bongsang
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Bongsang
custom_nodes.description: The 'ComfyUI-Bongsang' is very useful tools for a diffusion model developer.

custom_nodes.author: 5x00
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PiAPI-Faceswap
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI nodes that integrates [a/PiAPI faceswap](https://piapi.ai/faceswap-api) service into ComfyUI. This can be helpful if you're trying to create a workflow that includes faceswap for commercial usage.

custom_nodes.author: muxueChen
custom_nodes.title: CosyVoice2 for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI_NTCosyVoice is a plugin of ComfyUI for Cosysvoice2

custom_nodes.author: cenzijing
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Markmap
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for creating mindmaps from markdown

custom_nodes.author: amorano
custom_nodes.title: Jovi_Spout
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Nodes for using Spout streams.

custom_nodes.author: AconexOfficial
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI GOAT Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes to level up your workflows performance and streamline specific functions.

custom_nodes.author: Jaminanim
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Random-Int-Divisor-Node
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom ComfyUI nodes for generating random integers within a range, adjusted to the nearest multiple of a user-defined divisor. Needlessly includes both an efficient and simple list implementation. Updates with each generation.

custom_nodes.author: LucipherDev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AniDoc
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Custom Nodes for 'AniDoc: Animation Creation Made Easier'. This approach automates line art video colorization using a novel model that aligns color information from references, ensures temporal consistency, and reduces manual effort in animation production.

custom_nodes.author: bear2b
custom_nodes.title: ColorMatrixGPU Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This node applies a custom 4x4 color matrix to an image using GPU acceleration via PyTorch.

custom_nodes.author: Vaibhavs10
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DDUF
custom_nodes.description: Run DDUF in ComfyUI - powered by Diffusers.

custom_nodes.author: tocubed
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EvTexture
custom_nodes.description: Wrapper for EvTexture Video Upscaler: [a/https://github.com/DachunKai/EvTexture](https://github.com/DachunKai/EvTexture)

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LatentSyncWrapper
custom_nodes.description: This node provides lip-sync capabilities in ComfyUI using ByteDance's LatentSync model. It allows you to synchronize video lips with audio input.

custom_nodes.author: sanbuphy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AudioLDM
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI Workflow to run audioldm-l-full pipeline
[a/https://huggingface.co/cvssp/audioldm-l-full](https://huggingface.co/cvssp/audioldm-l-full)

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WildPromptor
custom_nodes.description: Create dynamic prompts with wildcard list.

custom_nodes.author: sweetndata
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Sticker_Compositer
custom_nodes.description:
NODES:Sticker Compositer.
background frame + sticker

custom_nodes.author: Jash-Vora
custom_nodes.title: FitDiT
custom_nodes.description: [a/FitDiT](https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.10499): Advancing the Authentic Garment Details for High-fidelity Virtual Try-onon

custom_nodes.author: rohitsainier
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-InstagramDownloader
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node package that allows downloading and organizing Instagram content directly in your ComfyUI Output folder

custom_nodes.author: zmwv823
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Anytext
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial Simple And Rough Implementation Of [a/AnyText](https://github.com/tyxsspa/AnyText) and [a/Glyph-ByT5] (https://github.com/AIGText/Glyph-ByT5) and [a/JoyType](https://github.com/jdh-algo/JoyType)

custom_nodes.author: SKBv0
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI SKBundle
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes designed to enhance your workflow in ComfyUI. These nodes were developed to meet my own needs while working with ComfyUI. Although I'm not a programmer, I created these nodes with the help of Cursor AI and will continue to develop them over time.

custom_nodes.author: civen-cn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Whisper Translator
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI node that allows you to translate subtitles using the Whisper. Now support for multiple languages: ['zh', 'en', 'ja', 'ko', 'ru', 'fr', 'de', 'es', 'pt', 'it', 'ar'] You may need to put fonts in the 'fonts' folder to support different languages.

custom_nodes.author: WainWong
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Loop-image
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Loop Image is a node package specifically designed for image loop processing. It provides two main processing modes: Batch Image Processing and Single Image Processing, along with supporting image segmentation and merging functions.

custom_nodes.author: rhplus0831
custom_nodes.title: ComfyMepi
custom_nodes.description: Another mobile frontend for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: 0x-jerry
custom_nodes.title: Rembg Background Removal Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Rembg Background Removal Node for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: hay86
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LatentSync
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial implementation of [a/LatentSync](https://github.com/bytedance/LatentSync) for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: risunobushi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Similarity-Score
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that calculates CLIP and LPIPS similarity scores between two images.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HunyuanVideoStyler
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that adds cinematic and movie scene styles to video generation prompts. This node helps create more dynamic and professional-looking video outputs by incorporating iconic movie scene aesthetics.

custom_nodes.author: ahernandezmiro
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GCP_Storage_tools
custom_nodes.description: A set of ComfyUI nodes for GPC Storage access

custom_nodes.author: ciga2011
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI MarkItDown
custom_nodes.description: This node pack helps to convert various files to Markdown. It supports pdf, pptx, xlsx, docx, html and image files.

custom_nodes.author: amorano
custom_nodes.title: Jovi_GLSL
custom_nodes.description: Integrates GLSL shader support.

custom_nodes.author: IgalOgonov
custom_nodes.title: Simple String Repository
custom_nodes.description: Custom node that allows storing and accessing strings, meant to be parts of a prompt, in a simplified manner. Partially supports dynamic prompt syntax.
